name: Targus AMW15US Wireless Laser Mouse
Features: [20 Times More Sensitive – Targus laser technology has 20x more tracking sensitivity than typical optical mice, for greater accuracy and improved use on shiny surfaces, Power Management – Recharge via the USB charge cable; use the mouse during charging to ensure uninterrupted operation, Wireless Freedom – RF wireless technology provides a clean, uncluttered workspace free from cables]
